author: antoine
title: Cardano-L-EARN
description: The Cardano learning curve is very steep. Many want to learn but are severely limited by time, resources, and willpower.
solution: Cardano L-EARN is a Learn to Earn platform that lets developers learn Cardano knowledge and skills, and earn ADA for proof of learning.
experience:
Running learn-to-earn programs. English & Spanish.  github.com/blockdevsunited/l-earn
7 years organizing and teaching crypto communities.
